docs.snippet: Veteran NBA player Jason Collins signed a 10-day contract with the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday, making him the first openly gay athlete on a team roster in any of North America's four major professional sports leagues....
docs.lead_paragraph: Veteran NBA player Jason Collins signed a 10-day contract with the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday, making him the first openly gay athlete on a team roster in any of North America's four major professional sports leagues.

headline.main: Collins Signs With Nets as First Openly Gay Player
headline.print_headline: Collins Signs With Nets as First Openly Gay Player

docs.snippet: History? Pressure? Jason Collins would have none of it after becoming the NBA's first openly gay player....
docs.lead_paragraph: History? Pressure? Jason Collins would have none of it after becoming the NBA's first openly gay player.

headline.main: Nets' Collins Becomes NBA's 1st Openly Gay Player
headline.print_headline: Nets' Collins Becomes NBA's 1st Openly Gay Player

docs.snippet: More than 200,000 supporters vowed to keep their porch lights on through Sunday and roughly 10,000 people joined a weekend vigil for a 10-year-old girl who was snatched off a Missouri street and later found killed....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 200,000 supporters vowed to keep their porch lights on through Sunday and roughly 10,000 people joined a weekend vigil for a 10-year-old girl who was snatched off a Missouri street and later found killed.

headline.main: Thousands Remember Slain Missouri Girl With Porch Lights, Vigil

docs.snippet: Doug McDermott had 29 points to become one of the top-10 scorers in college basketball history, and No. 11 Creighton survived shaky free throw shooting at the end to post a hard-earned 72-71 victory over Seton Hall on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Doug McDermott had 29 points to become one of the top-10 scorers in college basketball history, and No. 11 Creighton survived shaky free throw shooting at the end to post a hard-earned 72-71 victory over Seton Hall on Sunday.

headline.main: No. 11 Creighton Holds Off Pesky Seton Hall 72-71
headline.print_headline: No. 11 Creighton Holds Off Pesky Seton Hall 72-71

docs.abstract: Several Broadway shows are courting male theatergoing demographic with particularly masculine themes.

docs.snippet: In a hearing before the National Labor Relations Board in Chicago, Northwestern players have laid out an argument that they are employees entitled to unionize....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a hearing before the National Labor Relations Board in Chicago, Northwestern players have laid out an argument that they are employees entitled to unionize.
docs.abstract: National Labor Relations Board panel hears testimony concerning whether Northwestern football players should have the right to collectively bargain as university employees; attempt by college players to unionize is a first.

headline.main: Test in Northwestern Case: Is College Football a Job?
headline.print_headline: Test in Northwestern Case: Is College Football a Job?

docs.snippet: In a session that lasted more than 12 minutes, Michael Sam conducted his first news conference since he publicly declared that he was gay....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a session that lasted more than 12 minutes, Michael Sam conducted his first news conference since he publicly declared that he was gay.
docs.abstract: NFL draft prospect Michael Sam meets with reporters at Lucas Oil Stadium; unlike any other soon-to-be professional football players, he wears button representing gay pride at his first news conference since publicly declaring his sexual orientation.

headline.main: At N.F.L. Combine, Michael Sam Says He Wants Focus on Field
headline.print_headline: At Combine, Gay Player Says He Wants Attention to Stay on Field

docs.snippet: LeBron James watched from the bench in a stylish gray suit, and with the game deadlocked at halftime, he took off his necktie....
